CodeBlockMethod.Name: description
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- 모델명 Basement에서 사용하는 컴포넌트 -- Basement 건물 생성 시 건물 체력바 엔티티 생성

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local Entity = self.Entity
local EntityPosition = Entity.TransformComponent.Position local BoxOffset = Entity.HitComponent.BoxOffset local BoxSize = Entity.HitComponent.BoxSize local Scale = Entity.TransformComponent.Scale
local BasementZoneName = "BasementZone" local BasementZoneModelID = "model://7d59a5ee-46bd-4ad7-a630-b0699db395b7" local BasementZonePosition = Vector3(EntityPosition.x, EntityPosition.y + BoxOffset.y - BoxSize.y/2, 0) local BasementZone = _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(BasementZoneModelID, BasementZoneName, Vector3.zero, Entity, nil)
BasementZone.UITransformComponent.Scale = Vector3.one / Scale.x BasementZone.UITransformComponent.WorldPosition = BasementZonePosition BasementZone:SetVisible(false) BasementZone:SetEnable(false)
